channel.title: [SFoL] SFoL 00: The Alternative Universe - (16/16) - Backups accepted!
channel.description:
![image|600x450](upload://p8B86a54keIvBfCjuTtpRaai7rY.jpeg)
# [color]The Alternative Universe[/color] *This game is part of 2nd anniversary event.*
### Game information: > **Start date:** 29/09 > **Phases:** 72 / 24 > **Night actions:** 1 hour before day start. > > Everything else same as in standard FoL match.
### Rules: [details="Rules"] > 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules > 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. > 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. > 4. Do not quote private host messages > 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose > 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. > 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. > 9. Lets all have fun and play together! > 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. > 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game. [/details]
### Mechanics: > Every player before gamestart will be asked to design 1-2 classes which they think would be cool to have in standard FoL match. > > You are not allowed to discuss class you create with anyone else, until all classes are created. > > After that all classes will be revealed and SFoL game with classic ToL rules, but using only roles designed by you will comence. > > After match ends FoL team will review created roles and how well they worked in the game, and consider adding them to standard FoL setup. > So... do your best!
### 2nd anniversary: > This game is part of 2nd anniversary event. > > Participants will be awarded lottery tickets for 2nd anniversary lottery. > In case of replacements, tickets will be split betwen players up to host discretion. > > People who will design 3 best roles (most enjoyable, balanced and innovative) will receive bonus tickets. Those roles will also be considered by FoL team for adding them in the standard FoL classcards.
## Playerlist: 1. Soulshade55r 2. Sulit 3. Jake 4. Mercenary 5. Maximus 6. Derps 7. Jgoes 8. Wazza 9. Marshal 10. Kai 11. Luxy 12. Geyde 13. BlueStorm 14. Maxwell 15. Simon 16. PKR
## Backups: 1. Magnus 2. KyoDaz 3. Solic
